firstStep.title: First Step
firstStep.description: This Trainia tests the combat skills of each ARKS. By following the instructions, one can learn new abilities while reaching the targeted goal.

enchancedEnemy.title: Enhanced Enemy
enchancedEnemy.description: This Trainia tests the combat skills of each ARKS. Use your combat skills to take out the Enhanced Pedas Sword.
enchancedEnemy.subMission3: Clear while taking damage fewer than 10 time(s)

swiftJump.title: Swift Jump
swiftJump.description: This Trainia tests the jumping abilities of every ARKS. Use "Jump" & "Double Jump" to reach the target goal.
swiftJump.subMission2: Clear while falling fewer than 5 time(s)
swiftJump.subMission3: Clear while using no more than 5 Glide(s)

wildRush.title: Wild Rush
wildRush.description: This Trainia tests the combat skills of each ARKS. Use your combat skills to take out every enemy.

testFlight.title: Test Flight
testFlight.description: This Trainia tests the flight skills of each ARKS. Use the "Photon Glide" to reach the target point.
testFlight.subMission2: Clear while falling fewer than 5 time(s)

roaringRush.title: Rolling Rush
roaringRush.description: This Trainia tests the combat skills of each ARKS. Use your skills to defeat the "Gororox".
roaringRush.subMission3: Clear while taking damage fewer than 15 time(s)

fleetingFight.title: Setsuna no Issen
fleetingFight.description: This Trainia tests the combat skills of each ARKS. Use your skills to defeat the "Bujin".
fleetingFight.subMission3: Clear while taking damage fewer than 20 time(s)

runway.title: Lone Way
runway.description: This Trainia tests the Dashing capabilities of each ARKS. Use the "Photon Dash" to reach the target point.

vanishingPath.title: Vanishing Way
vanishingPath.description: This Trainia will test ARKS' combat skills. Defeat all enemies, but be careful of Vanish Blocks.
vanishingPath.subMission3: Clear while falling fewer than 3 time(s)

narrowCage.title: Narrow Cage
narrowCage.description: This Trainia will test ARKS' combat skills. Use your skills to take out every last enemy.
narrowCage.subMission1: Clear while taking damage fewer than 20 time(s)

buddyAttack.title: Buddy Attack
buddyAttack.description: This Trainia will test ARKS' combat skills. Defeat all enemies while a Drome assists you.
buddyAttack.subMission1: Clear while keeping your Drome's obedience gauge at Lv.3
buddyAttack.subMission3: Clear while taking damage fewer than 20 time(s)

dynaAssault.title: Dynamic Assault
dynaAssault.description: This Trainia will test ARKS' combat skills. Use your skills to defeat the Lysentos.
dynaAssault.subMission3: Clear while taking damage fewer than 10 time(s)

parkourMaster.title: Parkour Master
parkourMaster.description: This Trainia will test ARKS' jumping skills. Use "Jump", "Double Jump" & "Wall Kick" to reach target point.
parkourMaster.subMission1: Clear while using fewer than 6 Glide(s)

runway2.title: Lone Way II
runway2.description: This Trainia will test ARKS' dashing skills. Use "PhotonDash" to reach the target point.

crazyTail.title: Crazy Tail
crazyTail.description: This Trainia will test ARKS' combat skills. Use your skills to defeat the Pangolan.
crazyTail.subMission3: Clear while taking damage fewer than 7 time(s)

slopeTile.title: Slope Style
slopeTile.description: This Trainia will test ARKS' movement skills. Use a Floating Board to reach the target point.
slopeTile.subMission2: Clear while using fewer than 2 Glide(s)

wildAvalanche.title: Wild Avalanche
wildAvalanche.description: This Trainia will test ARKS' combat skills. Use your skills to defeat the Ice Banther.
wildAvalanche.subMission2: Clear while taking damage fewer than 12 time(s)
wildAvalanche.subMission3: Clear while using fewer than 3 Recovery Action(s)

vanishingPath2.title: Vanishing Way II
vanishingPath2.description: This Trainia will test ARKS' dashing skills. Use Photon Dash to react the target point.
vanishingPath2.subMission3: Clear while using fewer than 2 Glide(s)

clockworkJail.title: Clockwork Jail
clockworkJail.description: This Trainia will test ARKS' combat skills. Use your skills to defeat all enemies.
clockworkJail.subMission3: Clear while taking damage fewer than 12 time(s)

holibleFlapping.title: Horrible Flapping
holibleFlapping.description: This Trainia will test ARKS' combat skills. Use your skills to defeat the Mach Ride.
holibleFlapping.subMission3: Clear while taking damage fewer than 10 time(s)

quarterstaff.title: Quarterstaff
quarterstaff.description: This Trainia will test ARKS' combat skills. Use your skills to defeat the Engouku.
quarterstaff.subMission3: Clear while taking damage fewer than 7 time(s)

faceTheDarkness.title: Face the Darkness
faceTheDarkness.description: This Trainia tests the combat skills of each ARKS. Use your skills to defeat the Dark Remnus.
faceTheDarkness.subMission3: Clear while taking damage fewer than 7 time(s)

helicalLine.title: Helical Line
helicalLine.description: This Trainia will test ARKS' movement skills. Make use of your athletic abilities to reach the target destination.
helicalLine.subMission2: Clear while using fewer than 7 Glide(s)
